    • Method Detail

      • changeCrisisStatus

        public PtBoolean changeCrisisStatus(java.lang.String crisisID,
                                    EtCrisisStatus status)
                             throws ServerNotBoundException,
                                    ServerOfflineException,
                                    IncorrectFormatException
        Takes an crisis that exists in the system and will change it's status to the one specified.
        Parameters:
        crisisID - The ID of the crisis to change the status of
        status - The EtCrisisStatus type to set the crisis status to
        Returns:
        Returns a PtBoolean of true if done successfully, otherwise will return a false
        Throws:
        ServerNotBoundException - is only thrown when attempting to access a server which has no current binding. This shouldn't happen, but you never know!
        ServerOfflineException - is an error that is thrown when the server is offline or not reachable
        IncorrectFormatException - is thrown when a Dt/Et information type does not match the is() method specified in the specification

      • oeGetCrisisSet

        public PtBoolean oeGetCrisisSet(EtCrisisStatus aEtCrisisStatus)
                         throws ServerOfflineException,
                                ServerNotBoundException
        Gets a list of all crises from the server with the status type of the one provided The list will be sent to the actor directly, via the ie method.
        Parameters:
        aEtCrisisStatus - The status of the crisis to filter by
        Returns:
        The success of the method
        Throws:
        ServerOfflineException - Thrown if the server is offline
        ServerNotBoundException - Thrown if the server is not bound
